channel.title: How Can I Only Do An Event Only Once?
channel.description:
Hello I just made an easter event for my players and they all really enjoy it...
my problem is that they can do it as many times as they want and the text is based on system messages.
if there is any way i can make it so they can only complete it once i will ++rep and really appreciate your help!!
(btw im on Delta Base)

item.title: How Can I Only Do An Event Only Once?
item.dc:creator: @ryanc268 ryanc268
item.description:
@ryanc268 wrote:

Thanks it was my first tutorial and self-coded event

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Only Do An Event Only Once?

item.title: How Can I Only Do An Event Only Once?
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

first u cant rep++ sorry lol. second idk ur problem but i really enjoyed ur event… and with ur problem instead of
i
like
pie… after each work put a space and it should look like this
i
like
pie
i like pie

item.title: How Can I Only Do An Event Only Once?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

I just saw your easter event it was really nice! Unfournately i dont know how to fix your problem =
Maybe you could help me?
Whenever i try to copy the codes it comes out like this
(EXAMPLE)
i
like
pie

would come out after i copy it as
ilikepie
No spaces =\
